meanings.definition: A system of Jewish mysticism and magic.
meanings.sent1: Studying qabalah helps people understand mystical teachings.
meanings.sent2: Many people find comfort in the teachings of qabalah.
meanings.sent3: The magician used qabalah to perform his tricks at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of qabalah was like a key that unlocked hidden wisdom.
meanings.sent5: Learning about qabalah opened up a whole new world of spirituality for him.

meanings.definition: The ancient Jewish tradition of mystical interpretation of the Bible.
meanings.sent1: Scholars study qabalah to gain deeper insights into the Bible.
meanings.sent2: The rabbi shared fascinating stories about the history of qabalah.
meanings.sent3: During the class, they joked that qabalah was like a secret code in the scriptures.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of qabalah was a beacon of light in her spiritual journey.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the mysteries of qabalah brought a sense of wonder and awe to the students.
